<p align="justify">
Hypertable is a no-sql database system. This project aims to bring a JPA like technology to Hypertable.

Using Hyperconnector is simple, you just need to complete 3 easy steps to use Hypertable
  # Create your hyperconnector annotated model objects (pojo entities)
  # Generate the classes needed for all the CRUD operations
  # Create the data table in Hypertable with the generated script

You are ready to go!
